divs: Sighting Detailsi saw an orange red glowing orb oval object in the sky i was coming home with my sister and mother as we drove home i notced a light coming from the woods and i saw it.as i glared at it it seemed to be stationary and we pulled over and watched it i felt nothing but it seemed to drift off and dissapeard from our site.
Summary: an orange red glowing orb i saw in the country.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Stedman
